document.full_text: the murder rate in boston and new york city jumped last year even as the overall violent crime rate in the united states fell for the fourth straight year, according to an fbi report released on monday.
document.title: murders in northeast jump, fbi stats show
lines_and_colors: the murder rate in boston and new york city jumped last year even as the overall violent crime rate in the united states fell for the fourth straight year, according to an fbi report released on monday.
